LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_TerrainMoveSpeedHediff.des: The fabric worn by this Arachnae Node-Pawn grants it higher movement speed on the Creep. The longer it stays on the Creep, the stronger the effect. The effect gradually fades after leaving the Creep.
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_TerrainTemptHediff.label: Creep Bonus: Temptation
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_TerrainTemptHediff.descrip: The fabric worn by this Arachnae Node-Pawn grants it the ability to twist minds and lure others.
LanguageData.HediffDef.ARA_TerrainTerrorRoar_Hediff.d: The fabric worn by this Arachnae Node-Pawn grants it the ability to unleash a majestic roar, which instills fear in enemies, forcing them to flee in terror.
